UTM Document Management System

Digital collection for UTM publication such as thesis, examination papers, articles and others. Please login with UTMID to download the full-text.

Opening Hours
-------------

Perpustakaan Sultanah Zanariah
------------------------------

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| Monday – Friday | 8.00am – 10.00pm |
| Saturday – Sunday | 8.00am – 5.00pm |
| Public Holiday | Close |

Perpustakaan Raja Zarith Sofiah
-------------------------------

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| Monday – Friday | 8.00am – 8.00pm |
| Saturday – Sunday | 8.00am – 5.00pm |
| Public Holiday | Close |

Perpustakaan UTM Kuala Lumpur
-----------------------------

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| Monday – Friday | 8.00am – 10.00pm |
| Saturday – Sunday | 8.00am – 5.00pm |
| Public Holiday | Close |

----------------------

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| Monday – Sunday | 8.00am – 5.00pm |
| Saturday, Sunday & Public Holiday | Close |
